name: Checklist II (For PSC Inspection - Typical Deficiencies)
description: Checklist based on typical deficiencies pointed out during Port State Control inspections.

items.text: Fire-Dampers, Valves, Quick Closing Devices: Are closing devices inoperable or fire dampers wasted? Is the internal fire damper operating normally?
Emergency shut-off valves on FO tanks: Are they seized or not operating normally?
LO tanks closing valve: Is it disabled in the open position or not closing properly?
Emergency fire pumps: Is the emergency fire pump inoperable or showing low pressure? Is the priming pump operating normally?
Fire main: Is there wastage, corrosion, or leaking? Are there any leaks when the system is running?
Fire main isolating valve: Is it inoperable or not operating normally?
Fire proof doors: Is there any damage to the fire door, including its packing and frame?
Self-closing proof doors: Is the self-closing device damaged or not operating normally?
Fire protection on Escape trunk: Is there any damage to the fire protection for the escape trunk or its door?
Cable penetration material: Is insulation material for fire division bulkheads/decks damaged or missing?
Fire protection material in Engine room: Are there any damaged or missing parts of fire protection material?
Explosive proof lamp: Is any explosive proof lamp defective or damaged?
Fixed Fire Extinguishing system (CO2): Is the system inoperative? Are CO2 cylinder pilot lines disconnected? Is there wastage on the CO2 pipeline?
items.details: Check if CO2/Foam system has been tested by air blow or water flow.

items.text: Hyper mist F.F.E system: Is the system inoperative? Is it switched on and is the suction valve opened?
Fire Extinguishers: Is the service report missing or not valid?
Fire hose/nozzle: Is any hose or nozzle defective or damaged?

Jacketed piping system for high pressure fuel lines: Has there been improper modification of the drain line or leakage alarm system? Are prevention measures correctly constructed and alarms operating normally?
Ready availability of Fire Fighting Equipment: Are portable fire extinguishers improperly arranged (not as shown in the fire plan)?
Fire main hydrant valve: Is any valve seized or not operating normally?
Fireman's outfit: Is the outfit defective or wasted?
Breathing Apparatus: Is it unserviceable? Has the cylinder been serviced properly?
Emergency escape breathing device (EEBD): Is any EEBD inoperative or not showing sufficient pressure?
Fire Detection System: Is the system inoperative or not operating normally?
Lifeboat engine: Is the engine inoperable or not operating normally?
Lifeboat shell: Is the shell wasted, holed, or damaged?
Lifeboat steering system: Is the steering system inoperative?
On-load release gear: Is it inoperable, inadequate, or not properly reset?
Lifeboat Inventory: Is any equipment missing or expired?
Embarkation ladder: Is the ladder wasted or damaged?
Embarkation lights: Are the lights or cables damaged?
Lifeboat davit: Is the davit wasted, holed, or corroded?
Launching sheaves and hooks: Is there corrosion or wastage on sheaves or hooks?
Inflatable Liferafts: Is the service certificate expired?
Liferaft stowage: Is the storage unsatisfactory or improper?
Hydrostatic release and painter: Are they incorrectly installed on float-free liferafts?
Lifebuoys: Are attachments defective? Is the lifebuoy itself, its markings, line, or retro-reflective tape wasted?
Lifebuoy smoke signal / self-igniting light: Is the smoke signal expired or is the self-igniting light out of order?
Oily-Water Separating Equipment: Is the separator inoperable? Is the casing wasted, holed, or corroded?
OWS discharge line: Is the discharge line wasted or corroded? Is the inside of the discharge pipe oily and dirty?
OWS by-pass line: Has an illegal by-pass line been fitted to the oil filtering equipment?
15ppm alarm arrangement: Is the alarm failing or not operating normally?
15ppm automatic stopping device: Is the device inoperable or not functioning normally?
SOPEP: Is the plan not updated? Are the lists of coastal state contacts current?
Cleanliness of Engine Room: Is there excessive oil or dirt in the engine room?
Propulsion main engine/Auxiliary engine: Is there any leakage of fuel oil or lubricating oil from the main engine, auxiliary engines, or other piping?
Auxiliary engine: Is any stand-by auxiliary engine not ready to use?
Beams, Frames, Floors: Is there wastage on hold frames, beams, etc.?
Longitudinals and transverse webs in WBTs: Is there wastage of longitudinals and transverse webs in Water Ballast Tanks?
Bulkheads: Are there any wasted or holed bulkheads in any compartment?
Emergency Lighting, Batteries & Switches: Is the emergency generator or battery deficient or not operating normally?
Emergency lighting: Are any emergency lights inoperable?
Ventilators, Air Pipes, Casings: Are there wasted or holed ventilators or air pipes?
Air pipe head float and closing device: Is the float of the air pipe head or its closing device damaged or stuck?
Hatch cover, Hatch coaming: Is there corrosion or wastage on hatch covers or coamings?
Hatch securing device: Is any securing device defective, missing, or showing excessive wear, including cleat-support brackets?
Hatch rubber packing: Is any rubber packing damaged or missing?
Weather tight doors: Is weather tightness defective? Are doors or packings corroded or wasted?
Multiple Load Line Certificates: Are different and valid LL certificates kept onboard? (Certificates not in use must be in a sealed envelope in the Master's safe).
Navigation equipment: Is any navigation equipment inoperative or not operating normally?
Charts: Are navigation charts not updated or corrected to the latest available information? Are charts for the intended voyage available?
Nautical Publications: Are publications (tide table, list of lights, list of radio signals, etc.) not updated or correct? Are the latest corrected supplements available?
Navigation lights: Are any navigation lights improperly fitted (not as shown in drawings)?
Daylight signaling light: Is it failing or not operating normally?
MF/HF Radio Installation: Is the MF/HF radio not operable? Is the GMDSS officer familiar with its operation, including function tests?
Reserve source of energy for radio: Is the DC power not operating normally? Do the batteries have low voltage?
Endorsement by flag states: Is any endorsement missing on STCW certificates from the flag state?
Certificates of Master & Officers: Does any crew member not have a valid certificate? Is any officer's certificate expired?
Abandon ship drills: Are crew members not familiar with the drill?
items.details: Is the abandon ship drill and related education executed?

items.text: Fire drills: Are crew members not familiar with the drill?
items.details: Is the fire drill and related education executed?

items.text: Enclosed space entry and rescue drills: Are crew members not familiar with the drill?
items.details: Is the enclosed space entry and rescue drill and related education executed?

items.text: MARPOL equipment operation: Are crew members not familiar with the operation of OWS, Incinerator, or Sewage treatment plant?
items.details: Is demonstration of operation and related education executed?
